ai-iti59:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti59:2.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant with three qualities has slipped free of Māra’s sway and shines like the sun.
ai-iti59:2.3_0: It’s when a mendicant has the entire spectrum of an adept’s ethics, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-iti59:2.4_0: A mendicant with these three qualities has slipped free of Māra’s sway and shines like the sun.”
ai-iti59:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti59:3.3_0: has slipped free of Māra’s sway
ai-iti59:4.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti59:5.3_0: Māra’s army comes to Māra’s power,
